verses.verse: And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> being <S%G4134>full<s%> of the <S%G40>Holy<s%> <S%G4151>Ghost<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> from <S%G2446>Jordan,<s%> and was <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G2048>wilderness,<s%>

Being <S%G5062>forty<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> <S%G3985>tempted<s%> of the <S%G1228>devil.<s%> And in <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%> he did <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G3762>nothing:<s%> and when they were <S%G4931>ended,<s%> he <S%G5305>afterward<s%> <S%G3983>hungry.<s%>

And the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> you be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G2036>command<s%> <S%G5129>this<s%> <S%G3037>stone<s%> that it be <S%G1096>made<s%> <S%G740>bread.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> It is <S%G1125>written,<s%> That <S%G444>man<s%> shall not <S%G2198>live<s%> by <S%G740>bread<s%> <S%G3441>alone,<s%> but by <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G4487>word<s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

And the <S%G1228>devil,<s%> <S%G321>taking<s%> him up <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G5308>high<s%> <S%G3735>mountain,<s%> <S%G1166>showed<s%> to him <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G932>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%G3625>world<s%> in a <S%G4743>moment<s%> of <S%G5550>time.<s%>

And the <S%G1228>devil<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G537>All<s%> <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> will I <S%G1325>give<s%> you, and the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of them: for that is <S%G3860>delivered<s%> to me; and to <S%G3739>whomsoever<s%> <S%G1437><s%> I <S%G2309>will<s%> I <S%G1325>give<s%> it.
<S%G1437>If<s%> you <S%G3767>therefore<s%> will <S%G4352>worship<s%> <S%G1799><s%> me, <S%G3956>all<s%> shall be <S%G4675>yours.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G5217>Get<s%> you <S%G3694>behind<s%> me, <S%G4567>Satan:<s%> for it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> You shall <S%G4352>worship<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your <S%G2316>God,<s%> and him <S%G3441>only<s%> shall you serve. <S%G3000><s%>

And he <S%G71>brought<s%> him to <S%G2419>Jerusalem,<s%> and <S%G2476>set<s%> him <S%G1909>on<s%> a <S%G4419>pinnacle<s%> of the <S%G2411>temple,<s%> and <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, <S%G1487>If<s%> you be the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G906>cast<s%> <S%G4572>yourself<s%> <S%G2736>down<s%> from <S%G1782>hence:<s%>
For it is <S%G1125>written,<s%> He shall give his <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G1781>charge<s%> <S%G4012>over<s%> you, to <S%G1314>keep<s%> you:

And in their <S%G5495>hands<s%> they shall <S%G142>bear<s%> you up, <S%G3379>lest<s%> <S%G3379>at<s%> <S%G3379>any<s%> <S%G3379>time<s%> you <S%G4350>dash<s%> your <S%G4228>foot<s%> <S%G4314>against<s%> a <S%G3037>stone.<s%>
And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> to him, It is <S%G2046>said,<s%> You shall not <S%G1598>tempt<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> your God. <S%G2316><s%>
And when the <S%G1228>devil<s%> had <S%G4931>ended<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G3986>temptation,<s%> he <S%G868>departed<s%> from him for a <S%G2540>season.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5290>returned<s%> in the <S%G1411>power<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee:<s%> and there <S%G1831>went<s%> out a <S%G5345>fame<s%> of him <S%G2596>through<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the <S%G4066>region<s%> <S%G4066>round<s%> <S%G4066>about.<s%>
And he <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> in their <S%G4864>synagogues,<s%> being <S%G1392>glorified<s%> of <S%G3956>all.<s%>

And he <S%G2064>came<s%> to <S%G3478>Nazareth,<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> he had been <S%G5142>brought<s%> up: and, as his <S%G3588>custom<s%> <S%G1486><s%> was, he <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> <S%G2250>day,<s%> and <S%G450>stood<s%> up for to <S%G314>read.<s%>

And there was <S%G1929>delivered<s%> to him the <S%G975>book<s%> of the <S%G4396>prophet<s%> <S%G2268>Esaias.<s%> And when he had <S%G380>opened<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> he <S%G2147>found<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%> <S%G3757>where<s%> it was <S%G1125>written,<s%>

The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of the Lord <S%G2962><s%> is on me, because <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1752><s%> he has <S%G5548>anointed<s%> me to <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G2097>gospel<s%> to the <S%G4434>poor;<s%> he has <S%G649>sent<s%> me to <S%G2390>heal<s%> the brokenhearted, <S%G4937><s%> <S%G2588><s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%> <S%G859>deliverance<s%> to the <S%G164>captives,<s%> and <S%G309>recovering<s%> of <S%G309>sight<s%> to the <S%G5185>blind,<s%> to <S%G649>set<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G859>liberty<s%> them that are bruised, <S%G2352><s%>
To <S%G2784>preach<s%> the <S%G1184>acceptable<s%> <S%G1763>year<s%> of the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>

And he <S%G4428>closed<s%> the <S%G975>book,<s%> and he <S%G591>gave<s%> it <S%G591>again<s%> to the <S%G5257>minister,<s%> and <S%G2523>sat<s%> <S%G2523>down.<s%> And the <S%G3788>eyes<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> them that were in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> were <S%G816>fastened<s%> on him.
And he <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%> to them, <S%G4594>This<s%> <S%G4594>day<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> ears. <S%G3775><s%>

And <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3140>bore<s%> him <S%G3140>witness,<s%> and <S%G2296>wondered<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G5485>gracious<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G1607>proceeded<s%> out of his <S%G4750>mouth.<s%> And they <S%G3004>said,<s%> Is not <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G2501>Joseph's<s%> <S%G5207>son?<s%>

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, You will <S%G3843>surely<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> to me <S%G5026>this<s%> <S%G3850>proverb,<s%> <S%G2395>Physician,<s%> <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G4572>yourself:<s%> <S%G3745>whatever<s%> we have <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G1096>done<s%> in <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G5602>here<s%> in your country. <S%G3968><s%>
And he <S%G2036>said,<s%> Truly <S%G281><s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> to you, <S%G3762>No<s%> <S%G4396>prophet<s%> is <S%G1184>accepted<s%> in his own country. <S%G3968><s%>

But I <S%G3004>tell<s%> you of a <S%G225>truth,<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> were in <S%G2474>Israel<s%> in the <S%G2250>days<s%> of <S%G2243>Elias,<s%> <S%G3753>when<s%> the <S%G3772>heaven<s%> was <S%G2808>shut<s%> up <S%G5140>three<s%> <S%G2094>years<s%> and <S%G1803>six<s%> <S%G3376>months,<s%> <S%G5613>when<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%> was <S%G1909>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the land; <S%G1095><s%>

But to <S%G3762>none<s%> of them was <S%G2243>Elias<s%> <S%G3992>sent,<s%> <S%G1508>save<s%> to Sarepta, <S%G4558><s%> a city of <S%G4605>Sidon,<s%> to a woman <S%G1135><s%> that was a widow. <S%G5503><s%>

And <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G3015>lepers<s%> were in <S%G2474>Israel<s%> in the <S%G1909>time<s%> of <S%G1666>Eliseus<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet;<s%> and <S%G3762>none<s%> of them was <S%G2511>cleansed,<s%> <S%G1508>saving<s%> <S%G3497>Naaman<s%> the Syrian. <S%G4948><s%>
And <S%G3956>all<s%> they in the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> when they <S%G191>heard<s%> <S%G5023>these<s%> things, were <S%G4130>filled<s%> with <S%G2372>wrath,<s%>

And <S%G450>rose<s%> up, and <S%G1544>thrust<s%> him out of the <S%G4172>city,<s%> and <S%G71>led<s%> him to the <S%G3790>brow<s%> of the <S%G3735>hill<s%> where <S%G1909>on<s%> <S%G3739><s%> their <S%G4172>city<s%> was <S%G3618>built,<s%> that they might <S%G2630>cast<s%> him <S%G2630>down<s%> <S%G2630>headlong.<s%>
But he <S%G1330>passing<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G3319>middle<s%> of them <S%G4198>went<s%> his way,

And <S%G2718>came<s%> <S%G2718>down<s%> to <S%G2584>Capernaum,<s%> a <S%G4172>city<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee,<s%> and <S%G2258>taught<s%> <S%G1321><s%> them <S%G1722>on<s%> the <S%G4521>sabbath<s%> days.
And they were <S%G1605>astonished<s%> <S%G1909>at<s%> his <S%G1322>doctrine:<s%> for his <S%G3056>word<s%> was with <S%G1849>power.<s%>

And in the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%> there was a <S%G444>man,<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G1140>devil,<s%> and <S%G349>cried<s%> out with a <S%G3173>loud<s%> <S%G5456>voice,<s%>

<S%G3004>Saying,<s%> <S%G1439>Let<s%> us <S%G1439>alone;<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> have we to do with you, you <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3478>Nazareth?<s%> are you <S%G2064>come<s%> to <S%G622>destroy<s%> us? I <S%G1492>know<s%> you <S%G5101>who<s%> you <S%G1488>are;<s%> the <S%G40>Holy<s%> One of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

And <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> him, <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5392>Hold<s%> your <S%G5392>peace,<s%> and <S%G1831>come<s%> out of him. And when the <S%G1140>devil<s%> had <S%G4496>thrown<s%> him in the <S%G3319>middle,<s%> he <S%G1831>came<s%> out of him, and <S%G984>hurt<s%> him not.

And they were <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1096>amazed,<s%> <S%G2285><s%> and <S%G4814>spoke<s%> <S%G4314>among<s%> <S%G240>themselves,<s%> <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G5101>What<s%> a <S%G3056>word<s%> is <S%G3778>this!<s%> for with <S%G1849>authority<s%> and <S%G1411>power<s%> he <S%G2004>commands<s%> the <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits,<s%> and they <S%G1831>come<s%> out.
And the <S%G2279>fame<s%> of him <S%G1607>went<s%> out <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5117>place<s%> of the <S%G4066>country<s%> <S%G4066>round<s%> <S%G4066>about.<s%>

And he <S%G450>arose<s%> out of the <S%G4864>synagogue,<s%> and <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G4613>Simon's<s%> <S%G3614>house.<s%> And <S%G4613>Simon's<s%> <S%G3994>wife's<s%> <S%G3994>mother<s%> was <S%G4912>taken<s%> with a <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G4446>fever;<s%> and they <S%G2065>sought<s%> him for her.

And he <S%G2186>stood<s%> <S%G1883>over<s%> her, and <S%G2008>rebuked<s%> the <S%G4446>fever;<s%> and it <S%G863>left<s%> her: and <S%G3916>immediately<s%> she <S%G450>arose<s%> and <S%G1247>ministered<s%> to them.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> when the <S%G2246>sun<s%> was <S%G1416>setting,<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> they that <S%G2192>had<s%> any <S%G770>sick<s%> with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3554>diseases<s%> <S%G71>brought<s%> them to him; and he <S%G2007>laid<s%> his <S%G5495>hands<s%> <S%G2007>on<s%> <S%G1538>every<s%> <S%G1520>one<s%> of them, and <S%G2323>healed<s%> them.

And <S%G1140>devils<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1831>came<s%> out of <S%G4183>many,<s%> <S%G2896>crying<s%> out, and <S%G3004>saying,<s%> You <S%G1488>are<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%> And he <S%G2008>rebuking<s%> them <S%G1439>suffered<s%> them not to <S%G2980>speak:<s%> for they knew that he was <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>

And when it was <S%G2250>day,<s%> he <S%G1831>departed<s%> and <S%G4198>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G2048>desert<s%> <S%G5117>place:<s%> and the <S%G3793>people<s%> <S%G2212>sought<s%> him, and <S%G2064>came<s%> to him, and <S%G2722>stayed<s%> him, that he should not <S%G4198>depart<s%> from them.

And he <S%G2036>said<s%> to them, I <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G2097>preach<s%> the <S%G932>kingdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> to <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G4172>cities<s%> <S%G2532>also:<s%> for therefore <S%G1519><s%> <S%G5124><s%> am I sent. <S%G649><s%>
And he <S%G2784>preached<s%> in the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> of <S%G1056>Galilee.<s%>
